articles.title: Reliance, BP to get govt capped price of $4.06 for new gas from KG-D6 - Business Standard
articles.description: Reliance-BP in November 2019 auctioned initial gas from the R-Series field at a biddable percentage of Brent crude oil price
articles.content: Reliance Industries and its partner BP will get only USD 4.06 a unit for the new gas they have started to produce from the eastern offshore KG-D6 field even though they have discovered a higher rate … [+4660 chars]
